title: Increase Gmail contact card size while maintaining single-line layout

requirements.summary: Increase the font size and overall dimensions of the Gmail contact card while ensuring the email address fits on one line without wrapping or overflow
acceptanceCriteria: The Gmail contact card displays with increased font size compared to current implementation
The email address remains on a single line without text wrapping
The card maintains proper spacing and alignment with other contact cards
Text does not overflow the card boundaries

file_operations.description: Modify the Gmail contact card element (identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[9]/div[1]/div[2]/a[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]) to increase font size and card dimensions. Adjust the text sizing classes while maintaining single-line display using appropriate CSS properties (text-overflow: ellipsis, white-space: nowrap, overflow: hidden). Preserve existing glassmorphism styling, hover effects, and responsive behavior. Ensure the card remains aligned with other contact cards (Name, Phone, WhatsApp, Instagram) in the section.
